price: 19. Toen kwam er iets langs (de tuin) van jullie Heer in de nacht en verbrandde het terwijl zij sliepen.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
